name: legends-ttrpg
description: Legends TTRPG system for Foundry VTT

scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:abilities && npm run pack:action && npm run pack:armor && npm run pack:equipment && npm run pack:feats && npm run pack:weapons && npm run pack:weaves && npm run pack:conditions && npm run pack:ancestries && npm run pack:backgrounds && npm run pack:flaws && npm run pack:traits && npm run pack:effects
scripts.pack:abilities: fvtt package pack abilities --in foundryvtt/packs/abilities/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:action: fvtt package pack action --in foundryvtt/packs/action/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:armor: fvtt package pack armor --in foundryvtt/packs/armor/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:equipment: fvtt package pack equipment --in foundryvtt/packs/equipment/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:feats: fvtt package pack feats --in foundryvtt/packs/feats/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:weapons: fvtt package pack weapons --in foundryvtt/packs/weapons/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:weaves: fvtt package pack weaves --in foundryvtt/packs/weaves/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:conditions: fvtt package pack conditions --in foundryvtt/packs/conditions/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:ancestries: fvtt package pack ancestries --in foundryvtt/packs/ancestries/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:backgrounds: fvtt package pack backgrounds --in foundryvtt/packs/backgrounds/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:flaws: fvtt package pack flaws --in foundryvtt/packs/flaws/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:traits: fvtt package pack traits --in foundryvtt/packs/traits/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.pack:effects: fvtt package pack effects --in foundryvtt/packs/effects/_source --out foundryvtt/packs
scripts.unpack:all: npm run unpack:abilities && npm run unpack:action && npm run unpack:armor && npm run unpack:equipment && npm run unpack:feats && npm run unpack:weapons && npm run unpack:weaves && npm run unpack:conditions && npm run unpack:ancestries && npm run unpack:backgrounds && npm run unpack:flaws && npm run unpack:traits && npm run unpack:effects
scripts.unpack:abilities: fvtt package unpack abilities --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/abilities/_source
scripts.unpack:action: fvtt package unpack action --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/action/_source
scripts.unpack:armor: fvtt package unpack armor --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/armor/_source
scripts.unpack:equipment: fvtt package unpack equipment --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/equipment/_source
scripts.unpack:feats: fvtt package unpack feats --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/feats/_source
scripts.unpack:weapons: fvtt package unpack weapons --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/weapons/_source
scripts.unpack:weaves: fvtt package unpack weaves --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/weaves/_source
scripts.unpack:conditions: fvtt package unpack conditions --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/conditions/_source
scripts.unpack:ancestries: fvtt package unpack ancestries --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/ancestries/_source
scripts.unpack:backgrounds: fvtt package unpack backgrounds --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/backgrounds/_source
scripts.unpack:flaws: fvtt package unpack flaws --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/flaws/_source
scripts.unpack:traits: fvtt package unpack traits --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/traits/_source
scripts.unpack:effects: fvtt package unpack effects --in foundryvtt/packs --out foundryvtt/packs/effects/_source

author: athelu
